entities.name: rosier
entities.description: Rosier is mentioned as being dead and killed in a struggle with Crouch.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as having caught Rosier shortly after Harry was too.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as whispering to Harry and indicating a chunk out of his nose to Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being shown the chunk out of Moody's nose by Moody.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as starting to worry that his information would be of no use to the Ministry.

relationships.description: Crouch killed Rosier in a struggle.
Moody showed Dumbledore the chunk out of his nose.
